sentences.en: A communication channel, of which each end can simultaneously transmit and receive.
sentences.cn: 一种两端都能同时发送和接收报文的(通信)信道.

sentences.en: A signal - relay satellite would transmit information from the telescope to Earth.
sentences.cn: 望远镜接收到的信息将由转播信号的一颗卫星转播到地球上.

sentences.en: A telegram will be the quickest way to transmit the message.
sentences.cn: 打电报将是传递这个信息的最快途径.

sentences.en: A telegraph can transmit two different signals : a dot and a dash.
sentences.cn: 一台发报机可发射两种讯号:点和线.

sentences.en: Marconi now found that he could transmit Morse Code signals.
sentences.cn: 他现在可以用它来发送和接收莫尔斯电码了.

sentences.en: Parents transmIt'some of their characteristics to their children.
sentences.cn: 父母把一些特有的素质遗传给儿女.

sentences.en: Terminal fittings transmit their force in bearing.
sentences.cn: 端部连接器将其力传到支撑装置上去.

sentences.en: The device is not designed to transmit to satellites.
sentences.cn: 该设备不是为向卫星发送信号而设计的。

sentences.en: The roots transmit moisture and nutrient to the trunk and branches.
sentences.cn: 根将水分和养料输送到干和枝.

sentences.en: The students were hoist by their own petards, however, as Granada decided to transmit the programme anyway.
sentences.cn: 不过，学生们聪明反被聪明误，格拉纳达最终还是决定要转播这个节目。

sentences.en: The system transmits information over digital phone lines.
sentences.cn: 这一系统通过数字电话线路传输信息。

sentences.en: The US Open will be transmitted live via satellite.
sentences.cn: 美国公开赛将通过卫星现场直播。

sentences.en: These thin crystals transmit much of the power.
sentences.cn: 这些薄薄的晶体传导了大部分的动力。

sentences.en: This is currently the most efficient way to transmit certain types of data like electronic mail.
sentences.cn: 这是目前传送电子邮件等某些类型的数据的最高效方式。

sentences.en: Transmit it to your children and to your children's children.
sentences.cn: 还要把这种责任传给你们的后代,子子孙孙传下去.

words.tran_cn: 能传送的；能透射的；可传达的
传动装置，[机] 变速器；传递；传送；播送
[电讯] 发射机，[通信] 发报机；传达人
传递，发射（transmite的现在分词形式）

trans.tran_en: to send out electronic signals, messages etc using radio, television, or other similar equipment

trans.tran_cn: 传输，传送，传递，发射，传染
trans.tran_en: to send out electronic signals, messages etc using radio, television, or other similar equipment
